general_advisory: Soil moisture is adequate for sowing of rabi crops such as Groundnut, Horse gram, Green gram, Black gram, Cowpea, Sweet potato and Sesame in upland/medium lands. It is optimum time for sowing of Vegetables like cole crops (Cabbage, late Cauliflower and Broccoli), Solanaceous vegetables (Brinjal, Tomato, Chilli and Capsicum)...

advisory: The transplanted paddy is at Panicle Initiation to flowering stage in main field...
The present high humid weather condition and rainfall followed by clear sky is favourable for Brown Plant Hopper (BPH) and White Backed Plant Hopper (WBPH) infestation in paddy ...
The crop is cob development stage...
Infestation of Fall Army Worm in early sown maize crop has been reported in places...
To prevent Leaf spot and Leaf blight disease spray Mancozeb 63%WP+Carbendazim 12% @600 gm/acre...

The cauliflower seedlings in nursery are germination stage...

Start nursery preparation and complete sowing tomato seeds in nursery...
The onion seedlings in nursery are germination to one week stage...
Complete nursery preparation for sowing onion and sowing seeds in nursery...
